markets.question: Will Tinubu remain President of Nigeria through 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Bola Ahmed Tinubu remains the President of Nigeria through December 31, 2026.

markets.question: Will Naira reach 2000/USD in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Nigerian Naira officially trades at or above 2000 NGN per 1 USD on any major exchange during 2026.

markets.question: Will Naira strengthen below 1200/USD in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Nigerian Naira strengthens to trade below 1200 NGN per 1 USD during 2026.

markets.question: Will Nigeria's inflation fall below 20% in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria's official inflation rate falls below 20% during 2026.

markets.question: Will fuel subsidy return in Nigeria in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Nigerian government reinstates fuel subsidies during 2026.

markets.question: Will PDP win Edo or Ondo governorship in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if PDP wins any governorship election held in Nigeria during 2026.

markets.question: Will Nigeria win AFCON 2025?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Nigerian Super Eagles win the 2025 Africa Cup of Nations.

markets.question: Will Nigeria qualify for 2026 World Cup?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria qualifies for the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

markets.question: Will petrol price exceed 1500 Naira per litre in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if official petrol price in Nigeria exceeds 1500 NGN per litre during 2026.

markets.question: Will Dangote Refinery reach full capacity in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Dangote Refinery operates at full 650,000 bpd capacity during 2026.

markets.question: Will CBN governor be replaced in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria's Central Bank Governor is replaced during 2026.

markets.question: Will Nigeria's foreign reserves exceed $40 billion in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria's foreign reserves exceed $40 billion during 2026.

markets.question: Will there be nationwide protests in Nigeria in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria experiences major nationwide protests (similar to EndSARS) during 2026.

markets.question: Will minimum wage increase above 100k Naira in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Nigeria's minimum wage is increased above 100,000 NGN during 2026.

markets.question: Will Victor Osimhen transfer to Premier League club in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Victor Osimhen joins a Premier League club during 2026.

markets.question: Will South Africa's ANC lose majority in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if ANC holds less than 50% of seats after any 2026 election.

markets.question: Will Kenya's shilling strengthen against USD in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if the Kenyan Shilling ends 2026 stronger vs USD than it started.

markets.question: Will Ghana default on debt again in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Ghana misses any debt payment or restructures debt during 2026.

markets.question: Will Egypt host AFCON 2025?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if Egypt successfully hosts AFCON 2025 (Dec 2025 - Jan 2026).

markets.question: Will any African country adopt Bitcoin as legal tender in 2026?
markets.description: This market resolves YES if any African nation adopts Bitcoin as legal tender during 2026.
